Element.question: The patient is a:
Enter patient's temperature:
Enter patient's blood pressure:
Enter patient's heart rate:
Enter patient's respiration rate:
When did the patient's numbness begin?
Has this occurred before?
Where is the numbness located?
Is the numbness on one or both sides?
What type of sensation is the patient experiencing?
Element.choices: Decreased Sensitivity, Pins and Needles Sensation, No Sensation

Element.question: Has the location of the numbness changed over time? How?
Has the extent of the numbness changed over time, and if so, how?
Is the patient experiencing any accompanying pain?
If 'Yes', please describe.
Has the patient experienced any changes in sensation anywhere?
If 'Yes', please describe.
Is the patient experiencing any of the following? Check all that apply:
Does anything make it better?
If 'Yes', please describe.
Does anything make it worse?
If 'Yes', please describe.
Does the patient have a family history of numbness?
Has the patient had any back or neck surgeries?
Has the patient had any back or neck injuries?
Does the patient currently or has the patient ever had unexplainable back or neck pain?
If 'Yes' for any of the above questions, please explain.
Does the patient have diabetes or any other chronic illness?
If 'Yes', please describe.
Please list the medications the patient currently takes.
Does the patient use tobacco products?
What does the patient think is causing the problem?
Has the patient tried anything to treat the problem?
If yes, please describe.
Please enter any additional comments or information.
